author: AfterWorld
install_msg: Thanks for installing SpriteAnnouncer! This cog creates interactive announcements and discussion topics using character sprites. Use `[p]help spriteannouncer` to get started.
name: SpriteAnnouncer
short: Interactive topic announcements with character sprites
description: A cog that creates random announcements and discussion topics presented by character sprites. Includes customizable timing, topics, and characters, with interactive buttons for users to engage with.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
